item.title: Continued improvement of downscaled climate information for the globe, including testing of RCMs
item.description: CIAT has stood first in terms of providing downscaled climate change predictions. Continued work in terms of climate change projections that can be used in different agricultural models will be done. Next years' plans include two main targets: (1) the downloading, processing, assessment, and use of daily predictions of CMIP5 (Coupled Model Intercomparison Project phase 5) and their downscaling using the delta method. Additional comparisons with CMIP3 might be done. (2) the downloading, processing and assessment of both PRECIS model runs, and also any available regional climate model runs (e.g. ETA from CPTEC, and results of the CORDEX framework).
